verbose_text: Employing an antibody that recognizes LKB1 phosphorylated at Ser 431 we observed that treat-ment of LKB1 +/+ wild-type MEFs with either forskolin to activate PKA or PMA to stimulate RSK, induced, as expected, a marked phosphorylation of LKB1 at Ser 431 (XREF_FIG D).
evidence: forskolin to activate PKA or PMA to stimulate RSK
